title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 5122 - Capital Improvements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 5122 - Capital Improvements

State Regulations
§ 5122.1 - Capital investments accounts
§ 5122.2 - Deposits into capital investments account
§ 5122.3 - Capital improvement plan
§ 5122.4 - Capital improvement plan implementation and withdrawals from the capital investments account

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 5122

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 104 [1], [19], 128

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
